thread.title: ‘John Wick’ Gets Reimagined With Nerf Weapons in Hilarious Spoof
thread.title_full: ‘John Wick’ Gets Reimagined With Nerf Weapons in Hilarious Spoof

author: Jonathan Sawyer
title: ‘John Wick’ Gets Reimagined With Nerf Weapons in Hilarious Spoof
text:
Last month we highlighted a rather humorous John Wick parody in which the roles were reversed, as Wick’s dog sought revenge for his master. Now, we’re back with yet another light-hearted take surrounding the new action franchise.
In this fun-filled parody, we find the neo-noir thriller remade with Nerf weapons . John Wick can thus be seen taking on assault after assault, eliminating the bad guys with Nerf guns, of course as opposed to actual weaponry.
To view the comedic reimagining, press play above. Also, see underneath for the aforementioned John Wick dog parody.
